trans-unit.source: Serves as a repository for information about the views supported by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> or classes that inherit from it.
trans-unit.target: Serve como um repositório para obter informações sobre as exibições compatíveis com o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> ou classes que herdam dele.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />.

trans-unit.source: The integer identifier for the designer view.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de inteiro para o modo de exibição de designer.

trans-unit.source: The string that specifies the name of the designer view.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que especifica o nome do modo de exibição de designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> associated with the designer view.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> associado ao modo de exibição de designer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> class by using an integer, a string, and an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> usando um inteiro, uma cadeia de caracteres e um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewId" /> or <paramref name="text" /> contains <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="viewId" /> ou <paramref name="text" /> contém <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The integer identifier for the designer view.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de inteiro para o modo de exibição de designer.

trans-unit.source: The string that specifies the name of the designer view.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que especifica o nome do modo de exibição de designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> associated with the designer view.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> associado ao modo de exibição de designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associated with the designer view.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associado ao modo de exibição de designer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> class by using an integer, a string, an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />, and an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> usando um inteiro, uma cadeia de caracteres, um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> e um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewId" />, <paramref name="text" />, or <paramref name="associatedDesigner" /> contains <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="viewId" />, <paramref name="text" /> ou <paramref name="associatedDesigner" /> contém <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the activity designer associated with the designer view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o designer de atividade associado ao modo de exibição de designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a ser comparado com o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to the current designer view.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.Object" /> especificado é igual ao modo de exibição de designer atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> and the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="obj" /> e o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> atual forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.Equals%2A> uses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.ViewId%2A> property to determine whether the compared designer views are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.Equals%2A> usa o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.ViewId%2A> propriedade para determinar se os modos de exibição de designers comparados são iguais.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> and is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.
trans-unit.target: Serve como uma função de hash para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> e é adequada para uso em algoritmos de hash e estruturas de dados como uma tabela de hash.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the image associated with the designer view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a imagem associada ao modo de exibição de designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer when the view is activated.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o designer quando a exibição é ativada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.OnActivate%2A> has no default behavior; classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView> must implement their own logic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.OnActivate%2A> não tem nenhum comportamento padrão; classes que herdam de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView> deve implementar sua própria lógica.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer when the view is deactivated.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o designer quando a exibição é desativada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.OnDeactivate%2A> has no default behavior; classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView> must implement their own logic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.OnDeactivate%2A> não tem nenhum comportamento padrão; classes que herdam de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView> deve implementar sua própria lógica.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the designer view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do modo de exibição de designer.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the dictionary of user data associated with the designer view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o dicionário de dados de usuário associados ao modo de exibição de designer.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the user data associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contém os dados de usuário associados a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.UserData%2A> is `null`, a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary> is created to hold the user data.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.UserData%2A> é `null`, um <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary> é criado para manter os dados de usuário.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier associated with the designer view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador associado ao modo de exibição de designer.

trans-unit.source: An integer that contains the identifier for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que contém o identificador para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" />.

trans-unit.source: This property uniquely identifies a view associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade identifica exclusivamente uma exibição associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: This property must contain a unique value.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade deve conter um valor exclusivo.
